title: Short-Intensive Course on Virtual Problem-Based Learning (VPBL) in Medicine

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic medical terminology and physiological concepts
context.additional_context: A non-degree short-term course for working professionals, focusing on solving real medical cases in virtual environments.

learning_goals: Enhance clinical situation analysis skills through virtual scenario-based problem-solving.
Design diagnostic processes while communicating effectively with peer learners using collaboration tools.
Identify learning gaps and propose improvement strategies based on formative assessments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
